name: flash-cards-dockerized
description: Dockerized version of the flash-cards application (api and frontend)

scripts.dev: npm run dev:api:up && npm run dev:app:up
scripts.dev:api:up: cd api && npm run redis:up && npm run db:up
scripts.dev:app:up: cd docker && docker-compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.dev.yml up -d client
scripts.dev:app:down: npm run dev:api:down && cd docker && docker-compose down
scripts.dev:api:down: npm run dev:api:backup && cd api && npm run db:down && npm run redis:stop
